Hero.title: Hungarian Guest Investor Residence Permit Program
Hero.subtitle: One of the EU's most affordable investment programs through residence permit programs.
Hero.imageAlt: The main visual showing our program

Features.title: Quantum Trade Limited
Features.subtitle: In partnership with our exclusive Turkish partner, Kayakey, Quantum provides comprehensive support at every stage of your journey to obtaining a Hungarian Guest Investor Residence Permit. From initial consultation to final approval, we ensure a seamless experience for you

support.title: How does Quantum help you?
support.point1: Advising you on the program's requirements and benefits
support.point2: Assisting in gathering and preparing all necessary documents
support.point3: Accompanying you to appointments while in Hungary
support.point4: Guiding you through the application process and submitting all required documentation
support.point5: Offering dedicated support before, during, and after your application
support.note: With Quantum by your side, you can navigate the residency process with confidence and ease.

AboutPreview.title: Program
AboutPreview.subtitle: The Hungarian Investor Visa Program is a residence by investment initiative that allows foreign investors to obtain residence in Hungary by making an investment.

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.description: The Hungarian investor program offers many advantages.
advantages.adv1: Access to EU and Schengen region
advantages.adv5: 8 years of transition to post -residence citizenship

requirements.title: Basic requirements
requirements.description: The basic conditions required to apply for the program:
requirements.req2: Have proof of funds for investment
requirements.req4: Making investment within the specified timeframe
requirements.req5: Investments must be maintained for at least 5 years

fund.title: Real Estate Investment Fund managed by SPRINT
fund.description:
SPRINT ASSET Hungária Zrt manages the SPRINT Real Estate Development and Investment Fund. The Fund was approved by the Hungarian Audit Authority on August 15, 2024.

A prerequisite for attaining the Hungarian Guest Investor Residence Permit is making a minimum investment of EUR 250,000 into the SPRINT Real Estate Development and Investment Fund.

An investment certificate will be issued as proof of investment, and this proof of investment is necessary during the guest investor residence permit application procedures. The investment must be held for a minimum of five years in order to maintain the residence permit.

AboutPreview.brosurDescription: You can download our brochure for more information about the program.

Process.title: Process
Process.description: Steps for attaining the Hungarian Guest Investor Residence Permit

step1.title: Get a Consultation Appointment
step1.description: Get a consultancy appointment to get detailed information about the process and to evaluate your personal situation.

step2.title: Due diligence checks are performed
step2.description: The history and financial status of the applicant are examined and the required documents are checked.

step3.title: Residence permit application is made
step3.description: Application is made for a guest investor visa and the investment commitment is officially declared.

step4.title: Travel to Hungary to complete the investment
step4.description: It is necessary to travel to Hungary to complete investment transactions and sign the necessary documents.

step5.title: Residence Permit Application is made
step5.description: After the investment is completed, the residence permit application is made officially.

step6.title: Visit Hungary to provide biometrics
step6.description: To provide biometric data such as fingerprints and photographs, you need to visit Hungary.

step7.title: Approval within 1-2 months.
step7.description: After the application is evaluated, the application is usually notified within 1-2 months.

step8.title: Residence permit is issued
step8.description: After the application is approved, the residence permit certificate is submitted to the applicant.

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions

q1.question: What is the minimum investment amount for the Hungarian Guest Investor Residence Permit?
q1.answer: The minimum investment amount is EUR 250,000

q2.question: What is the validity of the Residence Permit?
q2.answer: The Residence Permit is valid for 10 years and can be renewed for another 10 years.

q3.question: Can I bring my family members?
q3.answer: Yes, within the scope of the guest investor visa program, your spouse and your children under the age of 18 can get a residence permit with you.

q4.question: What are the required documents for the application?
q4.answer: The required documents include a valid passport, proof of investment, health insurance, a clean criminal record, and other supporting documents.

q5.question: Does the applicant have to visit Hungary during the application process or after?
q5.answer: Applicants must visit Hungary to complete their investment and submit biometrics during the application process.

q6.question: Is there a minimum residence requirement to maintain the permit?
q6.answer: No, there is no minimum stay requirement.

q7.question: When can I withdraw my investment?
q7.answer: The investment must be held for a minimum of five years in order to maintain the residence permit.

q8.question: How long does the application process take?
q8.answer: When all documents are presented completely, the application process usually takes 3-4 months.

q9.question: Can I apply for Hungarian citizenship?
q9.answer: Yes, you can apply for Hungarian citizenship after 8 years of legal residence.

q10.question: Can I travel freely within Europe with this residence permit?
q10.answer: Yes, this permit allows visa-free travel within the Schengen Zone for up to 90 days within a 180-day period.

q11.question: What are the application fees?
q11.answer: You can contact us to get complete information about the fees involved.

FAQ.contactDescription: Kayakey is the official and exclusive solution partner of Quantum in Türkiye for the Hungary Guest Investor Residence Permit Program. Local support and consultancy services throughout the entire application process are provided by Kayakey.

header.title: Kayakey: Quantum’s Exclusive Solution Partner in Türkiye
header.subtitle: Your solution partner specialising in residence by investment programs.

content.paragraph1: Kayakey is proud to be the exclusive solution partner of Quantum in Türkiye, bringing extensive expertise in citizenship and residence by investment programs. With several years of experience, Kayakey has successfully assisted high-net-worth individuals and investors in navigating the complexities of global migration programs, ensuring seamless transitions to new opportunities abroad.
content.paragraph2: Also, over the years, Kayakey has played a key role in strengthening Turkish-Hungarian commercial relations, fostering cross-border investment and economic collaboration between the two nations.
content.paragraph3: As Quantum’s exclusive solution partner in Türkiye, Kayakey works closely with clients seeking to obtain the Hungarian Guest Residence Permit, providing end-to-end support throughout the process. From initial consultation to final approval, Kayakey ensures that each client receives personalized guidance, facilitating a smooth and efficient application journey. With its extensive experience and strong collaboration with Quantum, Kayakey is committed to turning its clients' aspirations into reality.

steps.title: How does Kayakey work with you?
steps.step1: A comprehensive consultation is conducted to understand your needs and goals.
steps.step2: Detailed information is provided about the residence by investment program.
steps.step3: Support is offered for the collection and organization of the required documents.
steps.step4: All procedures in Türkiye are managed seamlessly.
steps.step5: Transactions in Hungary are carried out in cooperation with Quantum.

VisionPreview.title: Our vision
VisionPreview.description: As Quantum Trade Limited, we aim to become a leader in the field of global investment and consultancy with transparency, reliability and sustainable growth principles.
VisionPreview.point1: To provide innovative and sustainable investment solutions to provide the highest value to our customers.
VisionPreview.point2: Making investment processes more efficient and accessible by using technology and financial innovations.
VisionPreview.point3: To create a reliable consultancy platform that allows our investors to achieve their goals safely.
VisionPreview.point4: To establish long -term collaborations with transparency, ethical values ​​and customer -oriented service approach.
VisionPreview.point5: To facilitate access to economic and social opportunities with special programs such as Hungary Investor Visa.
